shapes3d.utils

Class Camera<T extends Camera<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes3d.utils.Camera<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Camera or class that extends Camera
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TerrainCamera

    public abstract class Camera<T extends Camera<T>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements processing.core.PConstants
    Base class for all cameras.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
